creator: kdurant@bellatlantic.net
text:
I am trying to use pgk to verify ant 1.5.1 bin or source download. For both of 
them I generate an invalid key for Magesh Umas...  It has a bad signature.

I am running windows 98, ant 1.5.1, jdk1.4.01.  I have tried running ant but I 
get no where. I can't even get the help page when I run ant -help.

-Kathleen

Which files have you piecked up from which server?

I can correctly verify Magesh's signature on all three binary download archives
for 1.5.1 with GnuPG on Linux.
creator: bodewig@apache.org
